title: How many Tracks do you have on your Spotify Playlist? - Quora

response.answer_text: My main Spotify playlist, music therapy by jayvalenci has 1996 songs since I added some Christmas music this week. It's mostly classic rock and singer-songwriter from the 1960s to the present. I also have specialty playlists for jazz, classical, world and ambient music which have about 200–300 tracks.
